ygData.subject: Re: Reaper of the Dead
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, to answer my own question, I went to Allakhazam. Sure enough, it s the same Thex Mallet quest that yields the Ring of the Dead. Also, the pic I saw of the
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, to answer my own question, I went to Allakhazam. Sure enough, it's the same Thex Mallet quest that yields the Ring of the Dead. Also, the pic I saw of the weapon was chargeless, and therefore I thought the Reaper's proc was a complete heal, doh! It only has 1 charge of the heal, but still, it's like a one-time Lay-Hands for us SKs.

Oh well, false alarm.
DV
----- Original Message -----
From: Tony Donatelli
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 1999 12:03 AM
Subject: [shadowknight] Reaper of the Dead


Reaper of the Dead -- new on eq'lizer, SK only, and it's effect is COMPLETE HEAL! Wow, I'd carry that around just for the effect!

Now for the tough part, have any of you questing SKs gotten one? It's a quest reward, and I figure you guys'd know best.

Thanks for any help!
DV
